duties_responsibilities.duty: Support cost and schedule reduction activities for acquisition and development efforts.
Lead program level acquisition support and guide successful program execution.
Provide expert program management inputs to Request for Proposal (RFPs) and other products.
Assist in the preparation of acquisition reports and milestone review documentations.
Develop and update program risk management plans.
Provide support in preparing and submitting funding documents and reports.
Interpret, organize, execute, and coordinate acquisition project assignments.
Keep abreast of DoD acquisition reform policies and recommend revisions to new and existing programs.
Provide direct support in preparation and review of program documents.
Ensure Mission Planning Environment systems are planned, managed, and developed to support requirements and capability demonstrations.
Provide direct support to Mission Planning Environment (MPE) systems in the PMO.
Assist with drafting contractual letters on program management issues.
Assist with development of source selection strategies, evaluation criteria, Request for Proposal (RFP) documentation, and other source selection administrative support.
Assist with mission execution including operational planning, operational analysis, capability development, and event integration.

education_certification.credential: High-school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's or Master's Degree preferred)
Security Clearance: Must have and be able to maintain a Secret level clearance
